attributes.action: Premier league football  should be voided this season in wake of the coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Other countries are stopping mass gatherings, sporting events and closing bars and restaurants and parliament needs to stop delaying the inevitable and follow suit before it is too late.
attributes.background: With the risk of being infected with Covid19 and the rising UK death rate, I believe that all football leagues should be voided this season to preserve life and minimize the risk of infection.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
